Iran unveils new air defense weaponry as regional tensions ramp up - IRNAIran unveiled new weaponry on Saturday including what it said was the locally made Arman anti-ballistic missile system and the Azarakhsh low-altitude air defense system, the official IRNA news agency reported. Yemen's Houthis say they targeted oil tanker PolluxYemen's Iran-aligned Houthis said on Saturday that they had fired missiles at oil tanker Pollux, which U.S. officials said the previous day had been hit by a missile. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 07:56:28 GMT ONGVIRDVMRIPPM53JKT2QODKUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthis-say-they-targeted-oil-tanker-pollux-2024-02-17/Reuters世界中东
Trump comments show Europe must spend more on defence, Latvia saysDonald Trump's stark comments on NATO show that Europeans should take more responsibility for their security, but they will still need the transatlantic military alliance, Latvian Foreign Minister Krisjanis Karins said. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 07:33:17 GMT CZXY57K3DVISRCX7VB6TQTYF2M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/trump-comments-show-europe-must-spend-more-defence-latvia-says-2024-02-17/Andrew Gray世界欧洲
US plans to send weapons to Israel even as Biden pushes for ceasefire, WSJ reportsThe Biden administration is preparing to send bombs and other weapons to Israel that would add to its military arsenal even as the U.S. pushes for a ceasefire in Gaza, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing current and former U.S. officials. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 04:53:26 GMT 6YMQUM3BHRMPRKN2SDLSIXZNQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us-plans-send-weapons-israel-even-biden-pushes-ceasefire-wsj-reports-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
Saint Vincent court rejects challenge to colonial-era anti-gay lawsThe top court in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines dismissed a challenge to anti-gay laws dating to British colonial rule on Friday, leaving the Caribbean country among a handful that still prescribes harsh criminal penalties against gays and lesbians. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 04:34:45 GMT M4THLHG6ABOFXGPVZM545DRNBY https://www.reuters.com/world/saint-vincent-court-rejects-challenge-colonial-era-anti-gay-laws-2024-02-17/Robertson S. Henry世界
China's Wang Yi held 'constructive' talks with Blinken in Munich - Chinese foreign ministryChina's Foreign Minister Wang Yi discussed lifting sanctions against Chinese companies and individuals in a meeting with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken at the Munich Security Conference, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Saturday. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 03:54:47 GMT KDO75Q3NQBPQXJF22CNIRVPGI https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-wang-yi-held-constructive-talks-with-blinken-munich-chinese-foreign-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
New York governor apologizes after implying Israel is justified to destroy GazaNew York Governor Kathy Hochul on Friday apologized for remarks she made at a Jewish philanthropy event in New York City that went viral on social media and which suggested Israel had justification to destroy Gaza following the Oct. 7 Hamas attack. SSR Mining says eight employees detained after Turkey mine landslideGold miner SSR Mining said on Friday that eight of its employees have been detained amid an investigation into a landslide at its mine in Turkey and that operations there remain suspended. Family of Beach Boys mastermind Brian Wilson seeks conservatorship for himTwo longtime associates of Beach Boys co-founder Brian Wilson have petitioned a court, at his family's behest, to place him under a conservatorship, asserting the musician is unable to care for himself following his wife's death in January. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 02:53:23 GMT O423TI5HKRJYJD7SOEATDEOFI4 https://www.reuters.com/legal/family-beach-boys-mastermind-brian-wilson-seeks-conservatorship-him-2024-02-17/Steve Gorman, Dawn Chmielewski合法的
Ukrainian troops withdraw from Avdiivka as ammunition shortage bitesUkrainian troops withdrew from the devastated eastern town of Avdiivka, Ukraine's new army chief said in the early hours of Saturday, paving the way for Russia's biggest advance since May 2023 when it captured the city of Bakhmut.
